title: Schema for an Open Contracting Record package
description: The record package contains a list of records along with some publishing meta data. The records pull together all the releases under a single Open Contracting ID and compile them into the latest version of the information along with the history of any data changes.

uri.title: Package Identifier
uri.description: The URI of this package that identifies it uniquely in the world.

publisher.description: Information to uniquely identify the publisher of this package.

scheme.description: The scheme that holds the unique identifiers used to identify the item being identified.

uid.description: The unique ID for this entity under the given ID scheme.

license.description: A license document that applies to this content.

publishedDate.description: The date that this package was published. Ideally this should be the latest date that there is release information in this package.

packages.description: A list of URIs of all the release packages that were used to create this record package.

records.description: The records for this data package.

ocid.title: Open Contracting ID
ocid.description: A unique identifier that identifies the unique Open Contracting Process. For more information see: http://ocds.open-contracting.org/standard/r/0__2__0/#defining-a-unique-contracting-process

releases.description: An array of linking identifiers or releases

oneOf.title: Linked releases
oneOf.description: A list of uri's that identify the releases associated with this Open Contracting ID. The URI is composed of the uri for the release-package and the releaseID e.g. http://publisher.gov/release-package.json#releaseID1

oneOf.title: Embedded releases
oneOf.description: A list of releases, with all the data

compiledRelease.title: Compiled release
compiledRelease.description: This is the latest version of all the contracting data, it has the same schema as an open contracting release.

versionedRelease.title: Versioned release
versionedRelease.description: This contains the history of the data in the compiledRecord. With all versions of the information and the release they came from.
